info.description: Service to host license information for other services to query over REST API.
info.title: laas (License as a Service) API

get.description: Get all audit records from the server
Get a specific audit records by ID

404.description: No audit entry with given ID

get.description: Get changelogs of an audit record

404.description: No audit entry with given ID

get.description: Get a specific changelog of an audit record by its ID

404.description: No changelog with given ID found

get.description: Filter licenses based on different parameters

parameters.description: GPLv2 compatibility flag status of license
parameters.name: gplv2compatible

parameters.description: GPLv3 compatibility flag status of license
parameters.name: gplv3compatible

parameters.description: Mary done flag status of license
parameters.name: marydone

parameters.description: OSI Approved flag status of license
parameters.name: osiapproved

parameters.description: FSF Free flag status of license
parameters.name: fsffree

post.description: Create a new license in the service

409.description: License with same shortname already exists

get.description: Get a single license by its shortname

patch.description: Update a license in the service

parameters.description: Shortname of the license to be updated
parameters.name: shortname

parameters.description: Update license body (requires only the fields to be updated)
parameters.name: license

409.description: License with same shortname already exists

get.description: Get obligation maps for a given license shortname

404.description: No license with given shortname found or no map for

get.description: Get obligation maps for a given obligation topic

404.description: No obligation with given topic found or no map for

put.description: Replaces the license list of an obligation topic with the given list in the obligation map.

parameters.description: Shortnames of the licenses to be in map
parameters.name: shortnames

patch.description: Add or remove licenses from obligation map for a given obligation topic
patch.summary: Add or remove licenses from obligation map

parameters.description: Shortnames of the licenses with action
parameters.name: shortname

get.description: Get all active obligations from the service

post.description: Create an obligation and associate it with licenses

get.description: Get an active based on given topic

404.description: No obligation with given topic found

parameters.description: Topic of the obligation to be updated
parameters.name: topic

parameters.name: topic
